// 2: realm2.0.7-2.0.11在debug的时候都有问题,会报错
// react-native-git-upgrade: 不能用react-native-git-upgrade命令直接升级react-native到最新版本，会把你已经修改过的模板文件还原。非常糟糕！！！
// code-push xxx -t 1.0.3: VIP code-push 脚本中的 -t 1.0.3 是指 要更新的 当前App的 版本, 而不是 你要更新到的 版本**
name: PomodoroApp

scripts.ios-bundle: react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ios/index.jsbundle --assets-dest ios/
scripts.ios-code-push-staging: code-push release-react rn-ios-pomodoro ios -m true --des "test color" -d Staging -b index.jsbundle -t 1.0.3
scripts.ios-code-push-production: code-push release-react rn-ios-pomodoro ios -m true --des "test color 2" -d Production -b index.jsbundle -t 1.0.3
scripts.ios-deploy-pgyer: npm run ios-bundle; cd ios; fastlane beta_pgyer
scripts.android-code-push-production: code-push release-react rn-android-pomodoro android -m true --des "test color 2" -d Production -b index.bundle -t 1.0.1
scripts.android-deploy-pgyer: npm run android-bundle; cd android; fastlane beta_pgyer
scripts.android-bundle: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/
scripts.android-install-apk-release-to-device: cd android && adb uninstall com.buerguo.pomodoroapp && adb install -r ./app/build/outputs/apk/app-release.apk
